title.narrative: Mongolia Mining Sector Technical Assistance Project

description.narrative: The Project's objective is to establish key pieces of the policy, fiscal, legal, regulatory and institutional framework for the mining and extractive sector that meets the needs of the public sector, industry, and civil society.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :-- IDA-44890, Schedule 2, Section D (b) | Description :Recipient to prepare and publicly disclose a RPF andRAP for the East Tsankhi Mine in form and substance acceptable to the Bank | Due Date :15-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section D (a) | Description :Recipient to carry out & publicly disclose an assessment of complianceof ETT's operation of the East Tsankhi mine with Bank standards or similar standards acceptable to the Association practices forenvironmental & social safeguards and recommendations on updateto the EMS | Due Date :15-Dec-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section V, 1 | Description :Erdenes MGL completed review of options and recommendations for therevision of its corporate systems, legal framework and structure with an objective to make its structure more consistent with thoseof a commercial entity operating according to OECD standards orsimilar as accepted by the Association for corporate governance. |Due Date :30-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I, C (a) | Description :Recipient to complete and furnish to the Association for discussionthe mining sector institutional assessment study in form and substance satisfactory to the Association | Due Date :31-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I, C | Description :Recipient to cause MoF to develop and furnish to the Association a setof draft model Stabilization Agreement or equivalent for mining and draft model Production Sharing Agreement or equivalent forpetroleum, in form and substance satisfactory to the association. | Due Date :30-Jun-2014
Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section I, C | Description :thereafter, implement the study recommendations as discussed with theAssociation | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule II, Section V, 2 | Description :select and engage the services of an external independent auditor forthe Project under terms of reference and with experience and qualificationsacceptable to the Association | Due Date :31-Mar-2009
